name: LudumDare50- Just run! Game
description:
Ludum Dare 50 Game Jam game! 

The theme is "Delay the inevitable". 

According to that in the game, you are trying to disturb the monster and save a girl. To do that you can throw some food or move rocks. Try your best and get fun :)

Cheers!

PS: Github link: https://github.com/PiotrPe0212/LD50-JustRun

Credits: All did meself whats means that all credit to Piotrax :D Cheers!
